step1.title: Random!
step1.description: Simply click the Random button on the toolbar to generate a base Notion-Avatar.

step2.title: Customize!
step2.description: You can choose your styles to customize the face, nose, mouth, eyes, eyebrows, glasses, hair, head, beard, accessories, and facial details of your avatar. Also, you can open the palette to choose your avatar background shape and DIY your own color.

step3.title: Download!
step3.description: Download your new favorite Notion-Style Avatar as a PNG or SVG.
